client_id.description: The unique identifier of the client associated with the time entries.

client_name.description: The name of the client for whom the time entries were recorded.

total_hours.description: The total number of hours worked for the client within the specified timeframe, including both billable and non-billable hours.

billable_hours.description: The total number of billable hours worked for the client within the specified timeframe.

currency.description: The currency used for billing the client's time entries.

billable_amount.description: The amount that can be billed for the client's hours worked within the specified timeframe.

from.description: The start date and time of the timeframe for which the time entries are being fetched.

to.description: The end date and time of the timeframe for which the time entries are being fetched.
